abstract class Animal
{
    public $name;
    public $age;

    public function Describe()
    {
        return $this->name . ", " . $this->age . " years old";
    }

    abstract public function Greet();
}

ฺฉูุงุณ ุฒุฑ ุงุฒ ฺฉูุงุณ ุจุงูุง ูุดุชู ุดุฏู : 

class Dog extends Animal
{
    public function Greet()
    {
        return "Woof!";
    }

    public function Describe()
    {
        return parent::Describe() . ", and I'm a dog!";
    }
}

$animal = new Dog();
$animal->name = "Bob";
$animal->age = 7;
echo $animal->Describe();
echo $animal->Greet();

<?php
abstract class Base_DB{
    private $id;
    abstract function update($data,$id);
    abstract function insert($data);
    function save($data){
        if(is_null($this->id)){
            $this->insert($data);
        }else{
            $this->update($data,$this->id);
        }
    }
}
class MySQL_DB extends Base_DB{
    function update($data,$id)
    {
        // ฺฉุฏูุง ูุฑุจูุท ุจู ูุฑุงุด
    }
    function insert($data)
    {
        // ฺฉุฏูุง ูุฑุจูุท ุจู ุฏุฑุฌ ฺฉุฑุฏู
    }
}
class Oracle_DB extends Base_DB{
    function update($data,$id)
    {
        // ฺฉุฏูุง ูุฑุจูุท ุจู ูุฑุงุด
    }
    function insert($data)
    {
        // ฺฉุฏูุง ูุฑุจูุท ุจู ุฏุฑุฌ ฺฉุฑุฏู
    }
}
